Collection.LongName: TES/Aura L2 Ancillary Special Observation Product
Collection.DataSetId: TES/Aura L2 Ancillary Special Observation Product V005
Collection.Description: Atmospheric vertical profile estimates and associated errors (diagonals and covariance matrices), along with retrieved surface temperature, cloud effective optical depth, column estimates, quality flags, averaging kernels and a priori constraint vectors.
Collection.SuggestedUsage: The L2 Ancillary Special Observation Product file consists of measured and static parameters common to all species, such as Surface Pressure and Emissivity. The file is used in conjunction with other L2 Special Observation species files for detailed studies. There are separate data (Swath) objects corresponding to the Nadir and three Limb views. Each row (nTimes dimension) lines up with the data objects in the species files.
Collection.ProcessingLevelDescription: Geophysical Quantities at the sensor resolution or geolocated
Collection.VersionDescription: Updates to convergence criteria and carbon dioxide line parameters have improved the ozone, land surface temperature, nadir temperature, methane, cloud and limb products. Quality control information updated to catch unrealistic high surface ozone values.
Collection.CitationForExternalPublication: The data used in this study were produced by the TES Science Team at the TES SIPS and archived at the Langley DAAC. See ProductionDateTime for Published date.

Address.StreetAddress: NASA Langley Research Center, Mail Stop 157D

Instrument.Technique: Limb and Nadir viewing Infrared Fourier Transform Spectrometer

Sensor.LongName: Pointing FTS with 4 co-aligned detector arrays, 16 pixels each
